actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To adjust the amount of monthly old-age, survivors, and disability insurance payments under title II of the Social Security Act based on locality-based comparability payment rates.
short_title: Locality-based Social Security Benefits Act of 2017
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Locality-based Social Security Benefits Act of 2017

This bill directs the Social Security Administration to increase an individual's monthly Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance benefit amount in accordance with the locality-based comparability payment rate applicable to the federal locality-pay area in which the individual resides.

titles.title: Locality-based Social Security Benefits Act of 2017
